head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHILLER, LEONA (NEE LIEBERGALL)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHILLER, LEONA (NEE LIEBERGALL)

block.p: SCHILLER--Leona (nee Liebergall) on April 13, 2007 of Monroe, NJ formerly of Fort Lee, NJ. Beloved wife of the late Louis R., cherished daughter of the late Sophie and Joseph Liebergall, devoted mother of Harlan M. and Barry S. Schiller, dear sister of the late Melvin and Harvey Libergall, loving grandmother of Louis, Jenifer, Joy, Lawrence, Matthew, Michael, Claudia, and Paul, great-grandmother of Kelly, Kaitlyn, Bryan, and Elijah. Service Wednesday, 10:30am at Temple Emanu-El, 180 Piermont Road, Closter, NJ. For information, Gutterman Musicant, 800-522-0588.
